name: Hacky Sack City
description:
Hacky Sack City is an Android city-building puzzle game where you have to push completed buildings off the edge of your city!

Goal

Stack a building up to four stories then push it off the edge.

If you push a completed building off the edge before it is completed you lose!

A building is completed once it is 4 stories high. You'll know it's completed when it has a flag on top.

Push one of each completed building off the map to beat the level.

Buildings stop after moving 3 blocks.

Controls

Drag cards onto the city to pick them up, release them to place them in the city.

Drag to rotate the city. Hold near the edge to rotate the city slowly.
